name: Haunted Mines 5
overview: One of the Haunted Mine series of six games by Skippy, created in 1994 and released by the Emerald Mines Club of Australia. The game is a Boulder Dash\Emerald Mine type game where you collect the emeralds, defy the brain-taxing obstacles and reach the exit, all before the time runs out. The game contains many levels from the simple to the nearly impossible, all for one or two players.
